select * from dl_pay_log where order_sn in
#{item}

select o.order_id, o.order_sn, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.mobile, l.lottery_name, l.lottery_classify_id, o.order_status, o.pay_name, o.ticket_amount, o.winning_money, o.bonus, o.surplus, o.third_party_paid, o.add_time, o.pay_time, p.pay_order_sn, channel.channel_name FROM dl_order o LEFT JOIN dl_lottery_classify l ON o.lottery_classify_id = l.lottery_classify_id LEFT JOIN dl_user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dl_pay_log p ON o.order_sn = p.order_sn LEFT JOIN (select print.order_sn,print_lottery_com from dl_print_lottery print group by print.order_sn) printTemp ON printTemp.order_sn=o.order_sn LEFT JOIN dl_ticket_channel channel ON printTemp.print_lottery_com=channel.id where o.order_sn LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT(#{selectionTime}),'%')

select o.order_id, o.order_sn, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.mobile, o.order_status, o.pay_name, o.ticket_amount, o.winning_money, o.bonus, o.surplus, o.third_party_paid, o.add_time, o.pay_time, a.order_status mo_status, a.add_time mo_add_time FROM dl_order o LEFT JOIN dl_user u ON o.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dl_artifi_print_lottery a ON o.order_sn = a.order_sn WHERE o.add_time > 1540981190 and o.order_id IN
#{item}

SELECT user_id, money_paid, ticket_time, DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( ticket_time ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS ticket_time_str FROM dl_order WHERE DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( ticket_time ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) = #{addTime} AND order_status IN ( 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 )
SELECT * FROM dl_order_detail WHERE order_id = #{order_id}

SELECT COALESCE(count(a.user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(a.amount),0) as amount, COALESCE(sum(a.amountTicket),0) as amountTicket from (SELECT user_id,money_paid AS amount,ticket_amount AS amountTicket from dl_order where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') GROUP BY user_id HAVING min(add_time) >= #{pd.lastStart1} and min(add_time) <= #{pd.lastEnd1} ) a;

SELECT COALESCE(count(DISTINCT user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(money_paid),0) as amount, COALESCE(sum(ticket_amount),0) as amountTicket from dl_order where user_id not in (SELECT user_id from dl_order where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') GROUP BY user_id HAVING min(add_time) >= #{pd.lastStart1} and min(add_time) <= #{pd.lastEnd1} ) and add_time >= #{pd.lastStart1} and add_time <= #{pd.lastEnd1} and order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7');

SELECT COALESCE(count(DISTINCT user_id),0) as count, COALESCE(sum(money_paid),0) as amount, COALESCE(sum(ticket_amount),0) as amountTicket from dl_order where order_sn not in (SELECT order_sn from dl_order where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') GROUP BY user_id HAVING min(add_time) > #{pd.lastStart1} and min(add_time) < #{pd.lastEnd1} ) and user_id not in ( SELECT user_id from dl_order where add_time < #{pd.lastStart1} and order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') GROUP BY user_id having count(user_id)>1 ) and order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') and add_time > #{pd.lastStart1} and add_time < #{pd.lastEnd1}

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), "%Y-%m-%d" ) as date,
DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), "%Y-%m" ) as date,
lpc.play_name as playName, lpc.lottery_play_classify_id as classify, count(distinct o.user_id) as userCount, count(o.order_sn) as orderCount, sum(o.ticket_amount) as amount, sum(o.money_paid) as paidAmount FROM dl_order o LEFT JOIN dl_lottery_play_classify lpc on o.lottery_play_classify_id=lpc.lottery_play_classify_id where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7')
and DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), "%Y-%m-%d" ) >= #{pd.lastStart1 }
and DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( o.add_time ), "%Y-%m-%d" ) <= #{pd.lastEnd1 }
GROUP BY
date, lpc.play_name

SELECT COALESCE(sum( ticket_amount ),0) as amount, DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%H' ) as time FROM dl_order where order_status in ('3','4','5','6','7') and DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{pd.dayHour } GROUP BY time

SELECT det.match_id, sum( a.amount ) as amount FROM dl_order_detail det RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT o.order_id, sum( o.ticket_amount ) / ( count( o.order_sn ) * count( o.order_sn ) ) AS amount FROM dl_order o LEFT JOIN dl_order_detail d ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( d.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #{pd.lastStart1 } AND DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( d.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{pd.lastEnd1 } AND o.order_status IN ( '3', '4', '5', '6', '7' ) AND d.changci NOT IN ('T56','T57') GROUP BY o.order_sn ) a ON a.order_id = det.order_id GROUP BY det.match_id UNION SELECT det.changci as match_id, sum( a.amount ) as amount FROM dl_order_detail det RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT o.order_id, sum( o.ticket_amount ) / ( count( o.order_sn ) * count( o.order_sn ) ) AS amount FROM dl_order o LEFT JOIN dl_order_detail d ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( d.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= #{pd.lastStart1 } AND DATE_FORMAT( FROM_UNIXTIME( d.add_time ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= #{pd.lastEnd1 } AND o.order_status IN ( '3', '4', '5', '6', '7' ) AND d.changci IN ('T56','T57') GROUP BY o.order_sn ) a ON a.order_id = det.order_id GROUP BY det.changci
